materials: Aluminum Cans; Aluminum; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Ferrous Metals (Steel or Iron); Non-ferrous (Copper/Brass/Tin); Wire; Catalytic Converters; Scrap Metal; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: You must have a valid picture ID to get paid for cashing in your can recycling. All items need to be emptied out with all labels or any other exterior wrapping or attachments removed.
